医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
BU研究揭示了对抗高危神经母细胞瘤的关键MYCN 癌蛋白（与癌细胞生长相关的蛋白质）在各种人类癌症的起始、进展和使其难以治疗方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/BU-study-reveals-key-to-combating-high-risk-neuroblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/BU-study-reveals-key-to-combating-high-risk-neuroblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cb94114-c23a-4cde-8843-7287ef464266 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:06:00 -0400 BU study reveals key to combating high-risk neuroblastoma
柔软、有弹性的喉咙贴片可以帮助患有声音障碍的人说话患有声音障碍的人，包括患有病理性声带疾病或正在从喉癌手术中恢复的人，通常会发现很难或无法说话。这种情况可能很快就会改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Soft-stretchy-throat-patch-empowers-speech-in-people-with-voice-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Soft-stretchy-throat-patch-empowers-speech-in-people-with-voice-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61a159b0-92ea-424b-a86e-e9e0f29066fb Fri, 15 Mar 2024 13:34:00 -0400 Soft, stretchy throat patch empowers speech in people with voice disorders
搭载葡萄糖传感器技术构建通用药物监测系统莱斯大学的合成生物学家找到了一种利用自动胰岛素给药系统中使用的葡萄糖监测技术的方法，使其普遍适用于几乎任何药物的监测和给药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Piggybacking-the-glucose-sensor-technology-to-build-universal-drug-monitoring-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Piggybacking-the-glucose-sensor-technology-to-build-universal-drug-monitoring-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a77e124-4656-4306-b1d7-8f25feae2ce9 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 13:23:00 -0400 Piggybacking the glucose sensor technology to build universal drug monitoring system
研究深入了解大脑如何将动机转化为目标导向的行为饥饿可以驱动一种激励状态，引导动物成功追求目标——；觅食和寻找食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Research-provides-insight-into-how-the-brain-translates-motivation-into-goal-orient-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Research-provides-insight-into-how-the-brain-translates-motivation-into-goal-orient-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99baa1a5-d70c-4bd3-b654-91808ad1c179 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 13:06:00 -0400 Research provides insight into how the brain translates motivation into goal-oriented behavior
通过大脑转录组变化预测年龄的机器学习模型一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 5 期封面上，题为“Genome-widetranscriptome profiling”以及人脑年龄预测模型的发展。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Machine-learning-models-to-predict-age-from-brain-transcriptome-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Machine-learning-models-to-predict-age-from-brain-transcriptome-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d3ed81f-8b4f-4bca-821c-9fa923495418 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:54:00 -0400 Machine learning models to predict age from brain transcriptome changes
女同性恋、男同性恋和双性恋女性对烟草营销的反应更加积极罗格斯大学健康研究人员的两项研究表明，女同性恋、男同性恋和双性恋者（尤其是女性）对烟草营销的反应更积极，更倾向于每天吸烟，并且戒烟可能更困难。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Lesbian-gay-And-bi Sex-women-respond-more-positively-to-tobacco-marketing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Lesbian-gay-And-bi Sex-women-respond-more-positively-to-tobacco-marketing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=450a3c59-a10b-4a3f-9997-cb5ab8ea4734 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:47:00 -0400 Lesbian, gay and bisexual women respond more positively to tobacco marketing
手术前吃高脂肪食物可能会影响老年人记忆相关的认知功能在手术前几天吃高脂肪食物可能会加剧大脑中的炎症反应，从而干扰老年人与记忆相关的认知功能长达数周——而且，对动物的新研究表明，即使在年轻人中也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Eating-fatty-food-before-surgery-may-affect-memory-lated-cognitive-function-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Eating-fatty-food-before-surgery-may-affect-memory-lated-cognitive-function-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4325a30-584d-4542-b26f-32d1458abaff Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:46:00 -0400 Eating fatty food before surgery may affect memory-related cognitive function in older adults
蛋白质分析揭示了高海拔湖泊中新的极端微生物完美适应的微生物生活在从深海海沟到山顶的极端环境中。更多地了解这些极端微生物如何在恶劣的条件下生存，可以让科学家了解地球上的生命和其他行星上潜在的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Proteotyping-unveils-new-extremophiles-in-high-altitude-lakes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Proteotyping-unveils-new-extremophiles-in-high-altitude-lakes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31bb5d07-ce44-4fdf-bc82-76aeafbcca35 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:25:00 -0400 Proteotyping unveils new extremophiles in high-altitude lakes
研究揭开了新生儿中性粒细胞减少症的谜团与成人相比，新生儿非常容易受到感染，这些感染可能会导致严重的健康并发症，甚至死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Study-unlocks-the-mystery-of-neonatal-neutropenia-in-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Study-unlocks-the-mystery-of-neonatal-neutropenia-in-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e18f013c-f8e4-41de-bcaa-0f11025df1d3 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:17:00 -0400 Study unlocks the mystery of neonatal neutropenia in newborns
SNFists 提高疗养院居民的临终护理质量威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员表示，专业护理机构临床医生（SNFists）可能会降低疗养院居民住院期间承受压力的可能性，并改善他们最后几天的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/SNFists-enhance-end-of-Life-care-quality-for-nursing-home-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/SNFists-enhance-end-of-Life-care-quality-for-nursing-home-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46d7892b-72bb-43a1-b39f-6e0ac1692139 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:08:00 -0400 SNFists enhance end-of-life care quality for nursing home residents
